ResumePersonalData {\n  firstNameTh?: string;\n  lastNameTh?: string;\n  firstNameEn?: string;\n  lastNameEn?: string;\n  title?: string;\n  gender?: string;\n  birthDate?: string;\n  nationality?: string;\n  religion?: string;\n  phone?: string;\n  email?: string;\n\n  militaryStatus?: string;\n  address?: {\n    province?: string;\n    district?: string;\n    subdistrict?: string;\n interface ParsedResumeData {\n  personal: ResumePersonalData;\n  education: ResumeEducationData[];\n  experience: ResumeExperienceData[];\n  skills: string[];\n}\n\n// --- AI Match Jobs Types ---\nexport interface AIJobMatchRequest {\n  user_profile: {\n    skills: string[];\n    interests: string;\n    address: string;\n  };\n  job_posts: CompanyPostResponse[];\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResult {\n  job_id: string;\n  match_score: number;\n  reason: string;\n  location_status: \"Close\" | \"Far\" | \"Unknown\";\n  location_note?: string;\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResponse {\n  matches: AIJobMatchResult[];\n  overall_analysis: string;\n}\n\n// Track if we're currently refreshing token to avoid infinite loops\nlet isRefreshing = false;\nlet refreshPromise: Promise<boolean> | null = null;\n\nconst handleTokenRefresh = async (): Promise<boolean> => {\n  // If already refreshing, wait for that to complete\n  if (isRefreshing && refreshPromise) {\n    return await refreshPromise;\n  }\n\n  isRefreshing = true;\n  refreshPromise = (async () => {\n    try {\n      const refreshResponse = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN}`, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        credentials: \"include\",\n        headers: {\n          \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n        },\n      });\n\n      if (refreshResponse.ok) {\n        console.log(\"‚úÖ Token refreshed successfully\");\n        return true;\n      } else {\n        console.log(\"‚ùå Token refresh failed\");\n        // Don't redirect here - let middleware handle protected routes\n        // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n        return false;\n      }\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Token refresh error:\", error);\n      // Don't redirect on error - just return false\n      return false;\n    } finally {\n      isRefreshing = false;\n      refreshPromise = null;\n    }\n  })();\n\n  return await refreshPromise;\n};\nexport interface AIScoreResponse {\n  score: number;\n  education_score?: number;\n  experience_score?: number;\n  skill_score?: number;\n  level: string;\n  recommended_position: string;\n  analysis: string;\n  found_skills?: string[];\n  recommended_skills?: string[];\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n  retryOn401: boolean = true,\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  // Skip refresh for auth endpoints\n  const isAuthEndpoint = endpoint.includes(\"/authentication/\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/login\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/logout\");\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    let response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    // Handle 401 Unauthorized - try to refresh token\n    if (response.status === 401 && retryOn401 && !isAuthEndpoint) {\n      console.log(\"üîÑ Token expired, attempting refresh...\");\n      const refreshSuccess = await handleTokenRefresh();\n\n      if (refreshSuccess) {\n        // Retry the original request after refresh\n        console.log(\"üîÑ Retrying original request after token refresh...\");\n        response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n        console.log('API response status after refresh:', response.status, response.statusText);\n      } else {\n        // Refresh failed, return 401 to trigger redirect\n        return {\n          ok: false,\n          status: 401,\n          data: \"Token expired. Please login again.\" as unknown as T,\n        };\n      }\n    }\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    // If still 401 after refresh, just return the response\n    // Don't redirect - let middleware handle protected routes\n    // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  logout: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGOUT, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  adminLogin: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n\n    // Direct call to AI Service (Python)\n    const url = `${AI_SERVICE_URL}/parse-resume?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n        // Fetch automatically sets Content-Type to multipart/form-data with boundary\n      });\n\n      if (!response.ok) {\n        let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n        try {\n          const errorData = await response.json();\n          if (errorData && typeof errorData === 'object' && 'error' in errorData) {\n            errorMessage = (errorData as any).error;\n          }\n        } catch (e) {\n          // Ignore json parse error\n        }\n        throw new Error(errorMessage);\n      }\n\n      return await response.json();\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"AI Parse Resume error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n id: string;\n  company_id: string;\n  created_at: string;\n  updated_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface DashboardStats {\n  total_users: number;\n  new_users_today: number;\n string;\n  gender?: string;\n  birthDate?: string;\n  nationality?: string;\n  religion?: string;\n  phone?: string;\n  email?: string;\n\n  militaryStatus?: string;\n  address?: {\n    province?: string;\n    district?: string;\n    subdistrict?: string;\n    postalCode?: string;\n  };\n}\n\nexport interface ResumeEducationData {\n  school: string;\n  degree: string;\n  major: string;\n  startDate: string;\n  endDate: string;\n  description: string;\n}\n\nexport interface ResumeExperienceData {\n  company: string;\n  position: string;\n  positionType: string;\n  startDate: string;\n  endDate: string;\n  description: string;\n}\n\nexport interface ParsedResumeData {\n  personal: ResumePersonalData;\n  education: ResumeEducationData[];\n  experience: ResumeExperienceData[];\n  skills: string[];\n}\n\n// --- AI Match Jobs Types ---\nexport interface AIJobMatchRequest {\n  user_profile: {\n    skills: string[];\n    interests: string;\n    address: string;\n  };\n  job_posts: CompanyPostResponse[];\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResult {\n  job_id: string;\n  match_score: number;\n  reason: string;\n  location_status: \"Close\" | \"Far\" | \"Unknown\";\n  location_note?: string;\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResponse {\n  matches: AIJobMatchResult[];\n  overall_analysis: string;\n}\n\n// Track if we're currently refreshing token to avoid infinite loops\nlet isRefreshing = false;\nlet refreshPromise: Promise<boolean> | null = null;\n\nconst handleTokenRefresh = async (): Promise<boolean> => {\n  // If already refreshing, wait for that to complete\n  if (isRefreshing && refreshPromise) {\n    return await refreshPromise;\n  }\n\n  isRefreshing = true;\n  refreshPromise = (async () => {\n    try {\n      const refreshResponse = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN}`, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        credentials: \"include\",\n        headers: {\n          \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n        },\n      });\n\n      if (refreshResponse.ok) {\n        console.log(\"‚úÖ Token refreshed successfully\");\n        return true;\n      } else {\n        console.log(\"‚ùå Token refresh failed\");\n        // Don't redirect here - let middleware handle protected routes\n        // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n        return false;\n      }\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Token refresh error:\", error);\n      // Don't redirect on error - just return false\n      return false;\n    } finally {\n      isRefreshing = false;\n      refreshPromise = null;\n    }\n  })();\n\n  return await refreshPromise;\n};\nexport interface AIScoreResponse {\n  score: number;\n  education_score?: number;\n  experience_score?: number;\n  skill_score?: number;\n  level: string;\n  recommended_position: string;\n  analysis: string;\n  found_skills?: string[];\n  recommended_skills?: string[];\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n  retryOn401: boolean = true,\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  // Skip refresh for auth endpoints\n  const isAuthEndpoint = endpoint.includes(\"/authentication/\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/login\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/logout\");\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    let response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    // Handle 401 Unauthorized - try to refresh token\n    if (response.status === 401 && retryOn401 && !isAuthEndpoint) {\n      console.log(\"üîÑ Token expired, attempting refresh...\");\n      const refreshSuccess = await handleTokenRefresh();\n\n      if (refreshSuccess) {\n        // Retry the original request after refresh\n        console.log(\"üîÑ Retrying original request after token refresh...\");\n        response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n        console.log('API response status after refresh:', response.status, response.statusText);\n      } else {\n        // Refresh failed, return 401 to trigger redirect\n        return {\n          ok: false,\n          status: 401,\n          data: \"Token expired. Please login again.\" as unknown as T,\n        };\n      }\n    }\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    // If still 401 after refresh, just return the response\n    // Don't redirect - let middleware handle protected routes\n    // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  logout: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGOUT, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  adminLogin: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return string;\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): automatically\n    // Append provider to URL\n    const url = `${API_ENDPOINTS.AI_PARSE_RESUME}?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    const response = await apiCall<ParsedResumeData>(url, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: formData,\n      // FormData doesn't need Content-Type header, it's set automatically by browser\n      headers: {},\n    });\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n      if (typeof response.data === 'string') {\n        errorMessage = response.data;\n      } else if (response.data && typeof response.data === 'object' && 'error' in response.data) {\n        errorMessage = (response.data as any).error;\n      }\n      throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n\n    return response.data;\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: formData.append(\"file\", file);\n    if (folder) {\n      formData.append(\"folder\", folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const ok: response.ok,\n        status: response.status,\n        data,\n      };\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"File upload error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   *     method: \"DELETE\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ file_path: filePath }),\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Social API Types\nexport interface SocialConnectionRequest {\n  platform: string;\n  platform_user_id: string;\n  access_token: string;\n  refresh_token?: string | null;\n  expires_at?: string | null;\n  name?: string | null;\n  profile_image?: string | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialPostRequest {\n  platform_post_id: string;\n  content: string;\n  posted_at?: string | null;\n  likes_count?: number | null;\n  comments_count?: number | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisRequest {\n  // social_connection_id is taken from path parameter, not needed here\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts?: any[] | null;\n  strengths?: string[] | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialConnectionResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  platform: string;\n  platform_user_id: string;\n  name: string | null;\n  profile_image: string | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialPostResponse {\n  id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  platform_post_id: string;\n  content: string;\n  posted_at: string | null;\n  likes_count: number | null;\n  comments_count: number | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts: any[] | null;\n  strengths: string[] | null;\n  created_at: string;\n  updated_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialDataResponse {\n  connection: SocialConnectionResponse;\n  posts: SocialPostResponse[];\n  analysis: SocialAnalysisResponse | null;\n}\n\n// Social API Functions\nexport const socialAPI = {\n  /**\n   * Get all social connections for current user\n   */\n  getConnections: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create a new social connection\n   */\n  createConnection: async (\n    data: SocialConnectionRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get a specific social connection\n   */\n  getConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Delete a social connection\n   */\n  deleteConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<void>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<void>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"DELETE\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get posts for a social connection\n   */\n  getPosts: async (connectionId: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create posts for a social connection (batch)\n   */\n  createPosts: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    posts: SocialPostRequest[],\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(posts),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  getAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create or update analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  createAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    data: SocialAnalysisRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get all social data (connections + posts + analysis) for current user\n   */\n  getSocialData: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialDataResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialDataResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_DATA, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Environment Check\nexport const isDevelopment: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"development\";\nexport const isProduction: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"production\";\n\n// Utility function to get API info for debugging\nexport const getApiInfo = () => {\n  return {\n    baseUrl: API_BASE_URL,\n    endpoints: API_ENDPOINTS,\n    environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,\n    isDevelopment,\n    isProduction,\n  };\n};\n"],"names":[],"mappings":"AAAA,oBAAoB;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AACb,MAAM,eACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,IAAI;AACnC,MAAM,iBACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,0BAA0B,IAAI;;AA6BrC,MAAM,gBAAgB;IAC3B,iBAAiB;IACjB,OAAO;IACP,eAAe;IACf,QAAQ;IACR,aAAa;IACb,qBAAqB;IACrB,cAAc;IAEd,OAAO;IACP,UAAU;IACV,WAAW;IACX,SAAS;IACT,kBAAkB;IAClB,SAAS;IACT,gBAAgB;IAChB,YAAY;IACZ,aAAa;IACb,YAAY;IAEZ,UAAU;IACV,SAAS;IACT,eAAe;IACf,mBAAmB;IACnB,iBAAiB;IACjB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IACd,WAAW;IAEX,KAAK;IACL,iBAAiB;IAEjB,QAAQ;IACR,uBAAuB;IACvB,uBAAuB;IACvB,qBAAqB;IACrB,uBAAuB;IACvB,sBAAsB;IAEtB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IAEd,UAAU;IACV,gBAAgB;IAChB,8BAA8B;IAC9B,4BAA4B;IAC5B,gBAAgB;IAEhB,SAAS;IACT,oBAAoB;IACpB,mBAAmB;IACnB,cAAc;IACd,iBAAiB;IACjB,aAAa;AACf;AAkRO,MAAM,UAAU,OACrB,UACA,UAAsB,CAAC,CAAC;IAExB,MAAM,MAAc,GAAG,eAAe,UAAU;IAEhD,MAAM,iBAA6B;QACjC,SAAS;YACP,gBAAgB;YAChB,GAAG,QAAQ,OAAO;QACpB;QACA,aAAa;QACb,GAAG,OAAO;IACZ;IAEA,IAAI;QACF,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,aAAa,KAAK;QAC9B,MAAM,WAAqB,MAAM,MAAM,KAAK;QAC5C,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,SAAS,MAAM,EAAE,SAAS,UAAU;QAExE,MAAM,cAA6B,SAAS,OAAO,CAAC,GAAG,CAAC;QACxD,IAAI;QAEJ,IAAI;YACF,IAAI,eAAe,YAAY,QAAQ,CAAC,qBAAqB;gBAC3D,OAAO,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBAC1B,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,qBAAqB;YACnC,OAAO;gBACL,6DAA6D;gBAC7D,MAAM,WAAW,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBACpC,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB;gBACpC,OAAO;YACT;QACF,EAAE,OAAO,YAAY;YACnB,gEAAgE;YAChE,iDAAiD;YACjD,QAAQ,IAAI,CAAC,iDAAiD;YAC9D,OAAO;QACT;QAEA,OAAO;YACL,IAAI,SAAS,EAAE;YACf,QAAQ,SAAS,MAAM;YACvB;QACF;IACF,EAAE,OAAO,OAAO;QACd,QAAQ,KAAK,CAAC,mBAAmB;QACjC,MAAM;IACR;AACF;AAGO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,OAAO,OACL,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,KAAK,EAAE;YAClC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,cAAc;QACZ,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,aAAa,EAAE;YAC1C,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,QAAQ;QACN,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,MAAM,EAAE;YACnC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,YAAY,OACV,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,WAAW,EAAE;YACxC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,aAAa;QACX,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,YAAY,EAAE;YACzC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;AACF;AAEO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,UAAU,OACR,UACA,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,QAAQ,EAAE;YACrC,QAAQ; defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): AI_CONFIG.RESUME_PARSING_PROVIDER): Promise<ParsedResumeData> => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n\n    // Use apiCall to handle credentials and base URL automatically\n    // Append provider to URL\n    const url = `${API_ENDPOINTS.AI_PARSE_RESUME}?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    const response = await apiCall<ParsedResumeData>(url, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: formData,\n      // FormData doesn't need Content-Type header, it's set automatically by browser\n      headers: {},\n    });\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n      if (typeof response.data === 'string') {\n        errorMessage = response.data;\n      } else if (response.data && typeof response.data === 'object' && 'error' in response.data) {\n        errorMessage = (response.data as any).error;\n      }\n      throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n\n    return response.data;\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: apiCall<void>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"DELETE\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get posts for a social connection\n   */\n  getPosts: async (connectionId: string): \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create posts for a social connection (batch)\n   */\n  createPosts: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    posts: SocialPostRequest[],\n  ): \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(posts),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  getAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n  ): method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create or update analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  createAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    data: SocialAnalysisRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get all social data (connections + posts + analysis) for current user\n   */\n  getSocialData: async (): isDevelopment: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"development\";\nexport const isProduction: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"production\";\n\n// Utility function to get API info for ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: AI_CONFIG.RESUME_PARSING_PROVIDER): Promise<ParsedResumeData> => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n\n    // Direct call to AI Service (Python)\n    const url = `${AI_SERVICE_URL}/parse-resume?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n        // Fetch automatically sets Content-Type to multipart/form-data with boundary\n      });\n\n      if (!response.ok) {\n        let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n        try {\n          const errorData = await response.json();\n          if (errorData && typeof errorData === 'object' && 'error' in errorData) {\n            errorMessage = (errorData as any).error;\n          }\n        } catch (e) {\n          // Ignore json parse error\n        }\n        throw new Error(errorMessage);\n      }\n\n      return await response.json();\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"AI Parse Resume error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: AIJobMatchRequest, provider: string = AI_CONFIG.JOB_MATCHING_PROVIDER): Promise<AIJobMatchResponse> => {\n    // Direct call to folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n is taken from path parameter, not needed here\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts?: any[] | null;\n  strengths?: string[] | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialConnectionResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  platform: string;\n  platform_user_id: string;\n  name: string | null;\n  profile_image: string | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialPostResponse {\n  id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  platform_post_id: string;\n  content: string;\n  posted_at: string | null;\n  likes_count: number | null;\n  comments_count: number | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts: any[] | null;\n  strengths: string[] | null;\n  created_at: string;\n  updated_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialDataResponse {\n  connection: SocialConnectionResponse;\n  posts: SocialPostResponse[];\n  analysis: SocialAnalysisResponse | null;\n}\n\n// Social API Functions\nexport const socialAPI = {\n  /**\n   * Get all social connections for current user\n   */\n  getConnections: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create a new social connection\n   */\n  createConnection: async (\n    data: SocialConnectionRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get a specific social connection\n   */\n  getConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Delete a social connection\n   */\n  deleteConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<void>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<void>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"DELETE\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get posts for a social connection\n   */\n  getPosts: async (connectionId: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create posts for a social connection (batch)\n   */\n  createPosts: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    posts: SocialPostRequest[],\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(posts),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  getAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create or update analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  createAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    data: SocialAnalysisRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get all social data (connections + posts + analysis) for current user\n   */\n  getSocialData: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialDataResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialDataResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_DATA, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Environment Check\nexport const isDevelopment: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"development\";\nexport const isProduction: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"production\";\n\n// Utility function to get API info for debugging\nexport const getApiInfo = () => {\n  return {\n    baseUrl: API_BASE_URL,\n    endpoints: API_ENDPOINTS,\n    environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,\n    isDevelopment,\n    isProduction,\n  };\n};\n"],"names":[],"mappings":"AAAA,oBAAoB;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AAMpB;AALO,MAAM,eACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,IAAI;AACnC,MAAM,iBACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,0BAA0B,IAAI;;AA4BrC,MAAM,gBAAgB;IAC3B,iBAAiB;IACjB,OAAO;IACP,eAAe;IACf,QAAQ;IACR,aAAa;IACb,qBAAqB;IACrB,cAAc;IAEd,OAAO;IACP,UAAU;IACV,WAAW;IACX,SAAS;IACT,kBAAkB;IAClB,SAAS;IACT,gBAAgB;IAChB,YAAY;IACZ,aAAa;IACb,YAAY;IACZ,YAAY;IAEZ,UAAU;IACV,SAAS;IACT,eAAe;IACf,mBAAmB;IACnB,iBAAiB;IACjB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IACd,WAAW;IAEX,KAAK;IACL,iBAAiB;IAEjB,QAAQ;IACR,uBAAuB;IACvB,uBAAuB;IACvB,qBAAqB;IACrB,uBAAuB;IACvB,sBAAsB;IAEtB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IAEd,UAAU;IACV,gBAAgB;IAChB,8BAA8B;IAC9B,4BAA4B;IAC5B,gBAAgB;IAEhB,SAAS;IACT,oBAAoB;IACpB,mBAAmB;IACnB,cAAc;IACd,iBAAiB;IACjB,aAAa;AACf;AAiSO,MAAM,UAAU,OACrB,UACA,UAAsB,CAAC,CAAC;IAExB,MAAM,MAAc,GAAG,eAAe,UAAU;IAEhD,MAAM,iBAA6B;QACjC,SAAS;YACP,gBAAgB;YAChB,GAAG,QAAQ,OAAO;QACpB;QACA,aAAa;QACb,GAAG,OAAO;IACZ;IAEA,IAAI;QACF,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,aAAa,KAAK;QAC9B,MAAM,WAAqB,MAAM,MAAM,KAAK;QAC5C,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,SAAS,MAAM,EAAE,SAAS,UAAU;QAExE,MAAM,cAA6B,SAAS,OAAO,CAAC,GAAG,CAAC;QACxD,IAAI;QAEJ,IAAI;YACF,IAAI,eAAe,YAAY,QAAQ,CAAC,qBAAqB;gBAC3D,OAAO,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBAC1B,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,qBAAqB;YACnC,OAAO;gBACL,6DAA6D;gBAC7D,MAAM,WAAW,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBACpC,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB;gBACpC,OAAO;YACT;QACF,EAAE,OAAO,YAAY;YACnB,gEAAgE;YAChE,iDAAiD;YACjD,QAAQ,IAAI,CAAC,iDAAiD;YAC9D,OAAO;QACT;QAEA,OAAO;YACL,IAAI,SAAS,EAAE;YACf,QAAQ,SAAS,MAAM;YACvB;QACF;IACF,EAAE,OAAO,OAAO;QACd,QAAQ,KAAK,CAAC,mBAAmB;QACjC,MAAM;IACR;AACF;AAGO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,OAAO,OACL,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,KAAK,EAAE;YAClC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,cAAc;QACZ,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,aAAa,EAAE;YAC1C,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,QAAQ;QACN,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,MAAM,EAAE;YACnC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,YAAY,OACV,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,WAAW,EAAE;YACxC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,aAAa;QACX,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,YAAY,EAAE;YACzC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;AACF;AAEO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,UAAU,OACR,UACA,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,QAAQ,EAAE; string;\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): automatically\n    // Append provider to URL\n    const url = `${API_ENDPOINTS.AI_PARSE_RESUME}?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    const response = await apiCall<ParsedResumeData>(url, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: formData,\n      // FormData doesn't need Content-Type header, it's set automatically by browser\n      headers: {},\n    });\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n      if (typeof response.data === 'string') {\n        errorMessage = response.data;\n      } else if (response.data && typeof response.data === 'object' && 'error' in response.data) {\n        errorMessage = (response.data as any).error;\n      }\n      throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n\n    return response.data;\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts: any[] | null;\n  strengths: string[] | null;\n  created_at: string;\n  updated_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialDataResponse {\n  connection: SocialConnectionResponse;\n  posts: SocialPostResponse[];\n  analysis: SocialAnalysisResponse | null;\n}\n\n// Social API Functions\nexport const socialAPI = {\n  /**\n   * Get all social connections for current user\n   */\n  getConnections: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create a new social connection\n   */\n  createConnection: async (\n    data: SocialConnectionRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get a specific social connection\n   */\n  getConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Delete a social connection\n   */\n  deleteConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<void>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<void>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"DELETE\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get posts for a social connection\n   */\n  getPosts: async (connectionId: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create posts for a social connection (batch)\n   */\n  createPosts: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    posts: SocialPostRequest[],\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(posts),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  getAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create or update analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  createAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    data: SocialAnalysisRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get all social data (connections + posts + analysis) for current user\n   */\n  getSocialData: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialDataResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialDataResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_DATA, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Environment Check\nexport const isDevelopment: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"development\";\nexport const isProduction: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"production\";\n\n// Utility function to get API info for debugging\nexport const getApiInfo = () => {\n  return {\n    baseUrl: API_BASE_URL,\n    endpoints: API_ENDPOINTS,\n    environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,\n    isDevelopment,\n    isProduction,\n  };\n};\n"],"names":[],"mappings":"AAAA,oBAAoB;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AAMpB;AALO,MAAM,eACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,IAAI;AACnC,MAAM,iBACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,0BAA0B,IAAI;;AA6BrC,MAAM,gBAAgB;IAC3B,iBAAiB;IACjB,OAAO;IACP,eAAe;IACf,QAAQ;IACR,aAAa;IACb,qBAAqB;IACrB,cAAc;IAEd,OAAO;IACP,UAAU;IACV,WAAW;IACX,SAAS;IACT,kBAAkB;IAClB,SAAS;IACT,gBAAgB;IAChB,YAAY;IACZ,aAAa;IACb,YAAY;IAEZ,UAAU;IACV,SAAS;IACT,eAAe;IACf,mBAAmB;IACnB,iBAAiB;IACjB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IACd,WAAW;IAEX,KAAK;IACL,iBAAiB;IAEjB,QAAQ;IACR,uBAAuB;IACvB,uBAAuB;IACvB,qBAAqB;IACrB,uBAAuB;IACvB,sBAAsB;IAEtB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IAEd,UAAU;IACV,gBAAgB;IAChB,8BAA8B;IAC9B,4BAA4B;IAC5B,gBAAgB;IAEhB,SAAS;IACT,oBAAoB;IACpB,mBAAmB;IACnB,cAAc;IACd,iBAAiB;IACjB,aAAa;AACf;AAkRO,MAAM,UAAU,OACrB,UACA,UAAsB,CAAC,CAAC;IAExB,MAAM,MAAc,GAAG,eAAe,UAAU;IAEhD,MAAM,iBAA6B;QACjC,SAAS;YACP,gBAAgB;YAChB,GAAG,QAAQ,OAAO;QACpB;QACA,aAAa;QACb,GAAG,OAAO;IACZ;IAEA,IAAI;QACF,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,aAAa,KAAK;QAC9B,MAAM,WAAqB,MAAM,MAAM,KAAK;QAC5C,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,SAAS,MAAM,EAAE,SAAS,UAAU;QAExE,MAAM,cAA6B,SAAS,OAAO,CAAC,GAAG,CAAC;QACxD,IAAI;QAEJ,IAAI;YACF,IAAI,eAAe,YAAY,QAAQ,CAAC,qBAAqB;gBAC3D,OAAO,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBAC1B,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,qBAAqB;YACnC,OAAO;gBACL,6DAA6D;gBAC7D,MAAM,WAAW,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBACpC,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB;gBACpC,OAAO;YACT;QACF,EAAE,OAAO,YAAY;YACnB,gEAAgE;YAChE,iDAAiD;YACjD,QAAQ,IAAI,CAAC,iDAAiD;YAC9D,OAAO;QACT;QAEA,OAAO;YACL,IAAI,SAAS,EAAE;YACf,QAAQ,SAAS,MAAM;YACvB;QACF;IACF,EAAE,OAAO,OAAO;QACd,QAAQ,KAAK,CAAC,mBAAmB;QACjC,MAAM;IACR;AACF;AAGO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,OAAO,OACL,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,KAAK,EAAE;YAClC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,cAAc;QACZ,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,aAAa,EAAE;YAC1C,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,QAAQ;QACN,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,MAAM,EAAE;YACnC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,YAAY,OACV,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,WAAW,EAAE;YACxC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,aAAa;QACX,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,YAAY,EAAE;YACzC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;AACF;AAEO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,UAAU,OACR,UACA,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,QAAQ,EAAE;YACrC,QAAQ string;\n}\n\nexport interface ResumeExperienceData {\n  company: string;\n  position: string;\n  positionType: string;\n  startDate: string;\n  endDate: string;\n  description: string;\n}\n\nexport interface ParsedResumeData {\n  personal: ResumePersonalData;\n  education: ResumeEducationData[];\n  experience: ResumeExperienceData[];\n  skills: string[];\n}\n\n// --- AI Match Jobs Types ---\nexport interface AIJobMatchRequest {\n  user_profile: {\n    skills: string[];\n    interests: string;\n    address: string;\n  };\n  job_posts: CompanyPostResponse[];\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResult {\n  job_id: string;\n  match_score: number;\n  reason: string;\n  location_status: \"Close\" | \"Far\" | \"Unknown\";\n  location_note?: string;\n}\n\nexport interface AIJobMatchResponse {\n  matches: AIJobMatchResult[];\n  overall_analysis: string;\n}\n\n// Track if we're currently refreshing token to avoid infinite loops\nlet isRefreshing = false;\nlet refreshPromise: Promise<boolean> | null = null;\n\nconst handleTokenRefresh = async (): Promise<boolean> => {\n  // If already refreshing, wait for that to complete\n  if (isRefreshing && refreshPromise) {\n    return await refreshPromise;\n  }\n\n  isRefreshing = true;\n  refreshPromise = (async () => {\n    try {\n      const refreshResponse = await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN}`, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        credentials: \"include\",\n        headers: {\n          \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n        },\n      });\n\n      if (refreshResponse.ok) {\n        console.log(\"‚úÖ Token refreshed successfully\");\n        return true;\n      } else {\n        console.log(\"‚ùå Token refresh failed\");\n        // Don't redirect here - let middleware handle protected routes\n        // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n        return false;\n      }\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"Token refresh error:\", error);\n      // Don't redirect on error - just return false\n      return false;\n    } finally {\n      isRefreshing = false;\n      refreshPromise = null;\n    }\n  })();\n\n  return await refreshPromise;\n};\nexport interface AIScoreResponse {\n  score: number;\n  education_score?: number;\n  experience_score?: number;\n  skill_score?: number;\n  level: string;\n  recommended_position: string;\n  analysis: string;\n  found_skills?: string[];\n  recommended_skills?: string[];\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n  retryOn401: boolean = true,\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  // Skip refresh for auth endpoints\n  const isAuthEndpoint = endpoint.includes(\"/authentication/\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/login\") ||\n    endpoint.includes(\"/admin/logout\");\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    let response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    // Handle 401 Unauthorized - try to refresh token\n    if (response.status === 401 && retryOn401 && !isAuthEndpoint) {\n      console.log(\"üîÑ Token expired, attempting refresh...\");\n      const refreshSuccess = await handleTokenRefresh();\n\n      if (refreshSuccess) {\n        // Retry the original request after refresh\n        console.log(\"üîÑ Retrying original request after token refresh...\");\n        response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n        console.log('API response status after refresh:', response.status, response.statusText);\n      } else {\n        // Refresh failed, return 401 to trigger redirect\n        return {\n          ok: false,\n          status: 401,\n          data: \"Token expired. Please login again.\" as unknown as T,\n        };\n      }\n    }\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    // If still 401 after refresh, just return the response\n    // Don't redirect - let middleware handle protected routes\n    // This prevents redirect loops on public pages\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.REFRESH_TOKEN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  logout: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGOUT, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  adminLogin: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n\n    // Direct call to AI Service (Python)\n    const url = `${AI_SERVICE_URL}/parse-resume?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n        // Fetch automatically sets Content-Type to multipart/form-data with boundary\n      });\n\n      if (!response.ok) {\n        let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n        try {\n          const errorData = await response.json();\n          if (errorData && typeof errorData === 'object' && 'error' in errorData) {\n            errorMessage = (errorData as any).error;\n          }\n        } catch (e) {\n          // Ignore json parse error\n        }\n        throw new Error(errorMessage);\n      }\n\n      return await response.json();\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"AI Parse Resume error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: AIJobMatchRequest, provider: string = AI_CONFIG.JOB_MATCHING_PROVIDER): Promise<AIJobMatchResponse> => {\n    // Direct call to AI Service (Python)\n\n    // üí° ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô AI (How to change AI):\n    // ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß AI ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏™‡πà‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á provider folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n string;\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): automatically\n    // Append provider to URL\n    const url = `${API_ENDPOINTS.AI_PARSE_RESUME}?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    const response = await apiCall<ParsedResumeData>(url, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: formData,\n      // FormData doesn't need Content-Type header, it's set automatically by browser\n      headers: {},\n    });\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n      if (typeof response.data === 'string') {\n        errorMessage = response.data;\n      } else if (response.data && typeof response.data === 'object' && 'error' in response.data) {\n        errorMessage = (response.data as any).error;\n      }\n      throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n\n    return response.data;\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: formData.append(\"file\", file);\n    if (folder) {\n      formData.append(\"folder\", folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const ok: response.ok,\n        status: response.status,\n        data,\n      };\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"File upload error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   *     method: \"DELETE\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ file_path: filePath }),\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Social API Types\nexport interface SocialConnectionRequest {\n  platform: string;\n  platform_user_id: string;\n  access_token: string;\n  refresh_token?: string | null;\n  expires_at?: string | null;\n  name?: string | null;\n  profile_image?: string | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialPostRequest {\n  platform_post_id: string;\n  content: string;\n  posted_at?: string | null;\n  likes_count?: number | null;\n  comments_count?: number | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisRequest {\n  // social_connection_id is taken from path parameter, not needed here\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts?: any[] | null;\n  strengths?: string[] | null;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialConnectionResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  platform: string;\n  platform_user_id: string;\n  name: string | null;\n  profile_image: string | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialPostResponse {\n  id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  platform_post_id: string;\n  content: string;\n  posted_at: string | null;\n  likes_count: number | null;\n  comments_count: number | null;\n  created_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialAnalysisResponse {\n  id: string;\n  user_id: string;\n  social_connection_id: string;\n  big_five_scores: {\n    openness: number;\n    conscientiousness: number;\n    extraversion: number;\n    agreeableness: number;\n    neuroticism: number;\n  };\n  analyzed_posts: any[] | null;\n  strengths: string[] | null;\n  created_at: string;\n  updated_at: string;\n}\n\nexport interface SocialDataResponse {\n  connection: SocialConnectionResponse;\n  posts: SocialPostResponse[];\n  analysis: SocialAnalysisResponse | null;\n}\n\n// Social API Functions\nexport const socialAPI = {\n  /**\n   * Get all social connections for current user\n   */\n  getConnections: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create a new social connection\n   */\n  createConnection: async (\n    data: SocialConnectionRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTIONS, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get a specific social connection\n   */\n  getConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialConnectionResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<SocialConnectionResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Delete a social connection\n   */\n  deleteConnection: async (id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<void>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_CONNECTION.replace(\":id\", id);\n    return apiCall<void>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"DELETE\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get posts for a social connection\n   */\n  getPosts: async (connectionId: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create posts for a social connection (batch)\n   */\n  createPosts: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    posts: SocialPostRequest[],\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialPostResponse[]>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_POSTS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialPostResponse[]>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(posts),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  getAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Create or update analysis for a social connection\n   */\n  createAnalysis: async (\n    connectionId: string,\n    data: SocialAnalysisRequest,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialAnalysisResponse>> => {\n    const endpoint = API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_ANALYSIS.replace(\":id\", connectionId);\n    return apiCall<SocialAnalysisResponse>(endpoint, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify(data),\n    });\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Get all social data (connections + posts + analysis) for current user\n   */\n  getSocialData: async (): Promise<ApiResponse<SocialDataResponse[]>> => {\n    return apiCall<SocialDataResponse[]>(API_ENDPOINTS.SOCIAL_DATA, {\n      method: \"GET\",\n    });\n  },\n};\n\n// Environment Check\nexport const isDevelopment: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"development\";\nexport const isProduction: boolean = process.env.NODE_ENV === \"production\";\n\n// Utility function to get API info for debugging\nexport const getApiInfo = () => {\n  return {\n    baseUrl: API_BASE_URL,\n    endpoints: API_ENDPOINTS,\n    environment: process.env.NODE_ENV,\n    isDevelopment,\n    isProduction,\n  };\n};\n"],"names":[],"mappings":"AAAA,oBAAoB;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AAMpB;AALO,MAAM,eACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,IAAI;AACnC,MAAM,iBACX,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,0BAA0B,IAAI;;AA6BrC,MAAM,gBAAgB;IAC3B,iBAAiB;IACjB,OAAO;IACP,eAAe;IACf,QAAQ;IACR,aAAa;IACb,qBAAqB;IACrB,cAAc;IAEd,OAAO;IACP,UAAU;IACV,WAAW;IACX,SAAS;IACT,kBAAkB;IAClB,SAAS;IACT,gBAAgB;IAChB,YAAY;IACZ,aAAa;IACb,YAAY;IAEZ,UAAU;IACV,SAAS;IACT,eAAe;IACf,mBAAmB;IACnB,iBAAiB;IACjB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IACd,WAAW;IAEX,KAAK;IACL,iBAAiB;IAEjB,QAAQ;IACR,uBAAuB;IACvB,uBAAuB;IACvB,qBAAqB;IACrB,uBAAuB;IACvB,sBAAsB;IAEtB,eAAe;IACf,cAAc;IAEd,UAAU;IACV,gBAAgB;IAChB,8BAA8B;IAC9B,4BAA4B;IAC5B,gBAAgB;IAEhB,SAAS;IACT,oBAAoB;IACpB,mBAAmB;IACnB,cAAc;IACd,iBAAiB;IACjB,aAAa;AACf;AAkRO,MAAM,UAAU,OACrB,UACA,UAAsB,CAAC,CAAC;IAExB,MAAM,MAAc,GAAG,eAAe,UAAU;IAEhD,MAAM,iBAA6B;QACjC,SAAS;YACP,gBAAgB;YAChB,GAAG,QAAQ,OAAO;QACpB;QACA,aAAa;QACb,GAAG,OAAO;IACZ;IAEA,IAAI;QACF,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,aAAa,KAAK;QAC9B,MAAM,WAAqB,MAAM,MAAM,KAAK;QAC5C,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB,SAAS,MAAM,EAAE,SAAS,UAAU;QAExE,MAAM,cAA6B,SAAS,OAAO,CAAC,GAAG,CAAC;QACxD,IAAI;QAEJ,IAAI;YACF,IAAI,eAAe,YAAY,QAAQ,CAAC,qBAAqB;gBAC3D,OAAO,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBAC1B,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,qBAAqB;YACnC,OAAO;gBACL,6DAA6D;gBAC7D,MAAM,WAAW,MAAM,SAAS,IAAI;gBACpC,QAAQ,GAAG,CAAC,wBAAwB;gBACpC,OAAO;YACT;QACF,EAAE,OAAO,YAAY;YACnB,gEAAgE;YAChE,iDAAiD;YACjD,QAAQ,IAAI,CAAC,iDAAiD;YAC9D,OAAO;QACT;QAEA,OAAO;YACL,IAAI,SAAS,EAAE;YACf,QAAQ,SAAS,MAAM;YACvB;QACF;IACF,EAAE,OAAO,OAAO;QACd,QAAQ,KAAK,CAAC,mBAAmB;QACjC,MAAM;IACR;AACF;AAGO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,OAAO,OACL,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,KAAK,EAAE;YAClC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,cAAc;QACZ,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,aAAa,EAAE;YAC1C,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,QAAQ;QACN,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,MAAM,EAAE;YACnC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;IAEA,YAAY,OACV,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,WAAW,EAAE;YACxC,QAAQ;YACR,MAAM,KAAK,SAAS,CAAC;gBAAE;gBAAU;YAAS;QAC5C;IACF;IAEA,aAAa;QACX,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,YAAY,EAAE;YACzC,QAAQ;QACV;IACF;AACF;AAEO,MAAM,UAAU;IACrB,UAAU,OACR,UACA,UACA;QAEA,OAAO,QAAQ,cAAc,QAAQ,EAAE;YACrC,QAAQ string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport });\n  },\n\n  adminLogin: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.ADMIN_LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n (\n    file: File,\n    folder?: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<UploadResponse>> => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n    if (folder) {\n      formData.append(\"folder\", folder);\n    }\n\n    const url = `${API_BASE_URL}${API_ENDPOINTS.STORAGE_UPLOAD}`;\n\n    try {\n      const response = await fetch(url, {\n        method: \"POST\",\n        body: formData,\n        credentials: \"include\",\n      });\n\n      const data = await response.json();\n\n      return {\n        ok: response.ok,\n        status: response.status,\n        data,\n      };\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.error(\"File upload error:\", error);\n      throw error;\n    }\n  },\n\n  /**\n   * Upload profile image\n   * @param file - Image file to \"include\",\n      });\n\n      const data = await response.json();\n\n      return {\n        ok: response.ok,\n        status: response.status,\n        data,\n      };\n    } catch (error) {\n string;\n}\n\nexport const apiCall = async <T = any>(\n  endpoint: string,\n  options: ApiOptions = {},\n): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> => {\n  const url: string = `${API_BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;\n\n  const defaultOptions: ApiOptions = {\n    headers: {\n      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      ...options.headers,\n    },\n    credentials: \"include\", // Important for cookies\n    ...options,\n  };\n\n  try {\n    console.log('API call:', url, options);\n    const response: Response = await fetch(url, defaultOptions);\n    console.log('API response status:', response.status, response.statusText);\n\n    const contentType: string | null = response.headers.get(\"content-type\");\n    let data: T;\n\n    try {\n      if (contentType && contentType.includes(\"application/json\")) {\n        data = await response.json();\n        console.log('Parsed JSON data:', data);\n      } else {\n        // For plain text responses (like \"Admin login successfully\")\n        const textData = await response.text();\n        console.log('Plain text response:', textData);\n        data = textData as unknown as T;\n      }\n    } catch (parseError) {\n      // If parsing fails but status is OK, cookies might still be set\n      // Return empty data but keep the response status\n      console.warn(\"Response parsing error (might be plain text):\", parseError);\n      data = \"\" as unknown as T;\n    }\n\n    return {\n      ok: response.ok,\n      status: response.status,\n      data,\n    };\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error(\"API call error:\", error);\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\n// Specific API Functions\nexport const authAPI = {\n  login: async (\n    username: string,\n    password: string,\n  ): Promise<ApiResponse<any>> => {\n    return apiCall(API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: JSON.stringify({ username, password }),\n    });\n  },\n\n  refreshToken: async (): AI_CONFIG.RESUME_PARSING_PROVIDER): Promise<ParsedResumeData> => {\n    const formData = new FormData();\n    formData.append(\"file\", file);\n\n    // Use apiCall to handle credentials and base URL automatically\n    // Append provider to URL\n    const url = `${API_ENDPOINTS.AI_PARSE_RESUME}?provider=${provider}`;\n\n    const response = await apiCall<ParsedResumeData>(url, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      body: formData,\n      // FormData doesn't need Content-Type header, it's set automatically by browser\n      headers: {},\n    });\n\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      let errorMessage = \"Failed to parse resume\";\n      if (typeof response.data === 'string') {\n        errorMessage = response.data;\n      } else if (response.data && typeof response.data === 'object' && 'error' in response.data) {\n        errorMessage = (response.data as any).error;\n      }\n      throw new Error(errorMessage);\n    }\n\n    return response.data;\n  },\n\n  matchJobs: async (payload: AIJobMatchRequest, provider: string = AI_CONFIG.JOB_MATCHING_PROVIDER): Promise<AIJobMatchResponse> => {\n    // Direct call to AI Service (Python)\n\n    // üí° ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô AI (How to change AI):\n    // ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß AI ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏™‡πà‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á provider ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ô 'mistral',
